In Python, data can be stored in variables. A variable can have any single-word name, for example 'x', 'word' and 'my_variable' are all variable names.
Some words can't be used as variable names, these are known as keywords. For example 'print' is a keyword.
Try assigning the String "Hello" to a variable 'my_word' and printing out this variable.

To assign "Hello" to a variable write this:
my_word = "Hello"
Congratulations! You helped Richard with his problem!
